summary: High-energy manager skilled at building and motivating dynamic teams; cultivates a culture that encourages staff to share questions and ideas; driven to cut costs and boost revenue through innovative management; organized and diligent with strong written, oral, and interpersonal communication skills.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Developed a comprehensive facility operations manual and monthly/yearly management reports; reported issues to clients; managed payroll; maintained monthly inventory; wrote articles or press releases; recruited staff for Spa, Food & Beverage, Fitness, Sales, Maintenance, Aquatics, and Operations; conducted regular staff meetings and training; directed all facility operations to achieve sales and profitability; developed annual strategic plan; implemented membership programs.

experience.title: Regional General Manager and National Sales Manager
experience.description: Direct and coordinate daily operations over two clubs; drive sales, service, and financial performance; train and develop a sales team to achieve budgeted membership goals; manage budgets, variance statements, and audits; lead initiatives to improve member satisfaction and operational excellence.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Managed 70 health club employees, including a sales team and an operations team; hired, trained, and coached staff; led sales calls and strategic initiatives; built relationships with members; reduced payroll and supply costs; created a culture of accountability and trust; oversaw maintenance and supplier orders.

experience.title: Fitness Service Director
experience.description: Presented personal training packages to new members; paired clients with trainers; consistently exceeded monthly goals.

experience.title: Insurance Agent
experience.description: Provided service to clients' insurance needs by selling health, dental, accident, travel, and indemnity plans; engaged 75 clients weekly; developed long-term client sources via referrals and groups; consistently exceeded sales goals.

experience.title: Sales Director
experience.description: Set and met quotas; maintained sales records; trained and managed membership staff; led weekly meetings; built strong relationships with members; contributed to innovative strategies to acquire new members; awarded Top Sales Director in 2009, 2010, and 2011.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Reached monthly sales goals; toured and priced potential new members; performed weekly follow-up calls and emails; managed hundreds of leads; earned recognition as a top performer.

experience.title: Customer Service Manager
experience.description: Managed Customer Service and Operations staff; hiring, training, and disciplinary actions; ensured member support and satisfaction; organized member activities and handled complaints.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Maintained the Power Shack Fitness facilities; managed departmental managers; created annual budgets and contributed to the company’s financial success; oversaw operations during the company’s peak years (2002-2004).
